purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of Conditions. The application module supports the requirements to provide structured information objects that encapsulate parametric values used as criteria for decision making.

inscope.li: Condition that can be identified, versioned, dated and approved;
Condition specified by a textual description;
A simple criterion or a compound criteria;
Criterion specified by a textual description or a string attribute value;
Criterion specified by numeric value with unit of measure as a fixed or limiting value;
Criterion specified as a membership of a class;
Criterion specified as a state of an object or its environment;
Criterion specified by a relation to a date, date and time or time period;
Criterion specified by a relation to a planned or unexpected event;

outscope.li: Conditions represented by other linguistic expressions or codings;
